meanings.sent1: The inswept curtains gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The inswept hair framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The inswept path of fallen leaves made a natural carpet.
meanings.sent4: The inswept branches of the tree seemed to embrace the sky.
meanings.sent5: The inswept design of the building's architecture was truly captivating.

meanings.definition: Covered or filled by sweeping inward
meanings.sent1: The inswept bowl was overflowing with colorful fruits.
meanings.sent2: Her inswept arms held a bouquet of wildflowers.
meanings.sent3: The inswept basket was a perfect hiding spot for the kitten.
meanings.sent4: The inswept valley was a sea of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The inswept room was a haven of tranquility.

meanings.definition: Having a sweeping inward motion or appearance
meanings.sent1: The inswept waves crashed gently on the shore.
meanings.sent2: The inswept clouds gathered ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The inswept dance move captivated the audience.
meanings.sent4: The inswept wind carried the scent of pine trees.
meanings.sent5: The inswept landscape seemed to draw you in with its beauty.
